CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 27, 1954, pg. A10, reads: "Preparing 'Command Performance' - Chuck Fly, veteran dancer and dance instructor, who is in charge of this year's preparation for the annual Centre Avenue YMCA presentation, 'Command Performance,' compares notes with Sammy Nowlin, organist now appearing at Crawford Grill 2, who was the originator of the 'Command Performance' idea and who staged the first one of the annual programs. Here Sammy Nowlin shows Chuck Fly one of the songs he used in the first performance."
TitMainTitle: Dancer Chuck Fly, and organist Sammy Nowlin holding sheet music including "Mambo Jambo," in Crawford Grill No. 2
